overview:
Blythe Masters is Head of Commodities at J.P. Morgan Chase, responsible for the global team that provides integrated physical and financial commodity solutions products for clients. The business provides market-making, structuring, risk management, financing, and warehousing capabilities across a full spectrum of commodity asset classes. She was named to this position in 2007, and since that time she has also served on the JPMorgan Chase Executive Committee.

Blythe received a B.A. in economics from Trinity College, Cambridge. She lives in New York with her husband and daughter.
